title: Mathematics Educational Material Design Considering the [Large-Scale] "Vividness Effect"

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematics and algebraic concepts
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning environment utilizing asynchronous video lectures and text materials

learning_goals: Learners can explain the impact of engaging details in educational materials on learning objectives with ≥80% accuracy.
Learners can propose ≥3 criteria for selecting engaging details suitable for mathematical content.
Learners can design a balance between core content delivery and interest generation with ≥70% success rate based on provided learning objectives.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
